title: Amazon SDE-2 IN Offer
content:
Recently I got offer from Amazon India for SDE-2 role 

* Education: Tier 2 NON CSE In India
* Years of Experience: 5 YOE
* Prior Experience: Tier-1 Product Company In Bangalore
* Current Compensation: 29 LPA Base + 3 Variable + 3.5 L/yr ESOPS = 35.5 LPA
* Date of the Offer: July 2024
* Company: Amazon
* Title/Level: SDE-2 L5
* Location: India
* Salary: 42 LPA Base 
* Relocation/Signing Bonus: 19 LPA for 1st year, 15 LPA for 2nd year + 1.5 LPA relocation
* Stock bonus: 300 units with 5% ,15% 40% 40% vesting cycle over 4 years
* Bonus: N/A
* Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock):  65 LPA for 1st year
* Benefits: Standard Amazon benefits
* Other details: Competiting Offer 55 LPA (40 LPA Base + 5 L JB + 10L/yr ESOPS)  from a  startup
